Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player

Class ExtraDepositPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.Player
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player.ExtraDepositPlayer
public class ExtraDepositPlayer
extends Player
The type Change Resource player (it extends Player). It's the player with the ExtraDeposit LeaderCard.

  • Constructor Summary

    Instantiates a new Extra deposit player.
